addr: 1410 South Redondo Blvd,  Los Angeles, CA 90019
title: Algebra tutoring Saturdays for Middle School Students
desc: Algebra is a form of exercise for the brain. The practice of going through the steps for a given problem builds new connections in the brain, and develops skills of a strong critical thinker. The creator of Algebra Cards, Farnaz Ehtessabian, will be our math tutor for these 4 session. Come, join us! Get your child to work with this incredible math expert with years of teaching and education experience; an opportunity not to be missed.
